data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 55,280 lost in Dajabón that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dajabón, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 6,720 believers in Dajabón to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Dajabón, Dominican Republic to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 6,720 believers in the state of Dajabón into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Japanese people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Dajabón, Dominican Republic and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Dajabón you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dajabón, Dominican Republic has a population of 62,000.

We estimate Dajabón has 6,720 people who might know Jesus, 51,431 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,849 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Dajabón to agree with you and with one another.

location.name: Dajabón
